{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Collei
|date               = 2023-05-08
|zh                 = 
;今天是柯莱的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''这里这里——柯莱，生日快乐！
:'''柯莱：'''啊，是旅行者和派蒙！谢谢你们特意来看我。
:'''旅行者：'''生日快乐，听提纳里说你想找些新书，所以我们挑了一些带过来。
:'''柯莱：'''看上去都很有意思呢，《出发吧！嘟嘟可》、《少女薇拉的忧郁》…欸？兽米香香食谱…
:'''旅行者：'''欸？
:'''派蒙：'''那个…是我和旅行者说想吃这道菜…
:'''派蒙：'''好像不小心把食谱放进堆里了，嘿嘿…
:'''柯莱：'''派蒙想吃的话，等会留下一起吃饭吧，我来准备。
:'''派蒙：'''好耶！兽米香香——我们也来帮忙！
|dialogue_review_zh = 谢谢你们特意来看我。
|en                 =
;Today is [[Collei]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Paimon:''' Over here, over here! Happy birthday, Collei!
:'''Collei:''' Oh, it's Traveler and Paimon! Thanks for coming all the way out here to see me.
:'''Traveler:''' Happy birthday. We heard from [[Tighnari]] that you wanted to find some new books, so we picked some out for you.
:'''Collei:''' These all look really interesting. [[Let's Go, Dodoco!]], [[Vera's Melancholy]]... Hm? Recipe for [[Biryani]]...
:'''Traveler:''' Huh?
:'''Paimon:''' Um... That was the dish I told the Traveler I wanted to eat...
:'''Paimon:''' Guess I accidentally put it into the pile of books, hehe...
:'''Collei:''' If you want Biryani, stick around and we can eat together later. I can make it.
:'''Paimon:''' Yay! Biryani... We'll help out!
|dialogue_review_en = Thanks for coming all the way out here to see me.
}}
